meanings.definition: A nose that is hooked or curved outward.
meanings.sent1: The witch in the story had a long hooknoses.
meanings.sent2: The old man's hooknoses made him look wise.
meanings.sent3: The hooknoses of the clown's mask made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His hooknoses sniffed out trouble before it arrived.
meanings.sent5: The hooknoses of the bird helped it find food easily.

meanings.sent1: The family of witches all had hooknoses.
meanings.sent2: The hooknoses of the group stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The hooknoses of the twins made them easy to spot.
meanings.sent4: The hooknoses of the detectives helped them solve the case.
meanings.sent5: The hooknoses of the statues gave them a unique charm.
